description:
Small green uncle
One of the cards from Bunji`s collection has gone missing. Puzzled over what is going on, he asks his friends. There is a rumor going on that a "small green uncle" is doing it. That`s the story...
Produce
Mom peeked at Fumi`s nursery school. During art class, Fumi doesn`t make anything. Mom thinks it`s strange, and when she finally finds Fumi, around her is a group of boys busy making art and...
Button
Bunji just wants to keep on pressing buttons. The other day he pressed the call button on the ticket counter and caused trouble for the ticket agent. When Moms talks about this dilemma to Dad...
Snack Dad
This is not the usual "Snack Moms" but "Snack Dad" instead. A night when the family goes to bed, a bartender Dad acts like he`s working in a bar and Bunji walks into the place. It is a secret place where the two of them grumble about Mom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Small Green Man / Producer / Buttons / Snack Dad
ちいさいみどりのおじさん / プロデュース / ボタン / スナックとうさん
